channel.title: Demos on Jenkins X
channel.description: Recent content in Demos on Jenkins X

item.title: Articles
item.description: Defining And Running Serverless Deployments With Knative And Jenkins X by Viktor Farcic, July 17th, 2019 Jenkins X — Managing Nexus by Steve Boardwell, August 23th, 2019 Jenkins X — Managing Jenkins by Steve Boardwell, August 8th, 2019 Overriding Pipelines, Stages, And Steps And Implementing Loops In Jenkins X Pipelines by Viktor Farcic, June 30th, 2019 Jenkins X — TLS enabled Previews by Steve Boardwell, June 26th, 2019 Jenkins X — Securing the Cluster by Steve Boardwell, June 22nd, 2019 Ten Commandments Of GitOps Applied To Continuous Delivery by Viktor Farcic, June 21th, 2019 Upgrading Ingress Rules And Adding TLS Certificates With Jenkins X by Viktor Farcic, May 31th, 2019 The Evolution Of Jenkins Jobs And How We Got To The YAML-Based jenkins-x.

item.title: Talks and Conferences
item.description: 2019-12-02/3/4/5 GitOps by courtesy of Jenkins-X at DevOpsCon 2019, München (Germany) by Gerd Aschemann 2019-09-12 Dev and Run Small Projects on K8S with GitOps and Jenkins-X at Helm Summit, Amsterdam (The Netherlands)) by Gerd Aschemann 2019-09-02 Jenkins X - Continuously Driving the Kloud at GoDevOps 2019, Berlin (Germany) by Gerd Aschemann 2019-08-21 Jenkins X - Continuously Delivery for the Kloud at Java User Group Deutschland/Göttingen (Germany) by Gerd Aschemann

item.title: Create Cluster
item.description: This demo creates a new kubernetes cluster using these commands in parallel: jx create cluster gke jx create cluster aks jx create cluster minikube

item.title: Create Cluster GKE
item.description: This demo uses the jx create cluster gke command to create a new kubernetes cluster:

item.title: Create Spring
item.description: This demo uses the jx create spring command to create a new Spring Boot application with CI / CD pipelines with GitOps promotions:

item.title: Docker Image CVE Scanning
item.description: There is a blog on Announcing CVE docker image analysis with Anchore You can watch the video here

item.title: KubeCon 2018 Demo
item.description: Here is the video of a talk by James Strachan: Jenkins X: Easy CI/CD for Kubernetes at KubeCon Europe 2018. You can also get the slides from this talk here

item.title: DevOxx UK 2018 Demo
item.description: Here is the video of a talk by James Strachan: Jenkins X: Continuous Delivery for Kubernetes at DevOxx UK, 2018. You can also get the slides from this talk here
